name: Catastrophe (FRED DUFFIELD)
description:
A wizard finally managed to distil chaos energy into liquid form, when their cat, Whiskers, does what cats do best and knocks it off the table.

Help the wizard clear out the new monsters, collect all of the lost energy, and save  Whiskers.

Let There Be Chaos!

Includes 3 Difficulty options in the settings.

WASD: Move

Left Mouse: Shoot

Right Mouse/ Shift/ Spacebar: Dash

E: Open Portal

Made By:

Fred Duffield - https://fredduffield.itch.io/

Kyle Brunton - https://glitteringray.itch.io/

Taylor Moffat - https://beans832.itch.io/

Ashley Moffat & Pedro Holsbach

Music and sounds from FreeSound.org
